verses.name: Genesis 41:51
verses.text: And Joseph called the name of the firstborn Manasseh: For God, said he, hath made me forget all my toil, and all my father’s house.

verses.name: Genesis 41:52
verses.text: And the name of the second called he Ephraim: For God hath caused me to be fruitful in the land of my affliction.

verses.name: Genesis 41:53
verses.text: And the seven years of plenteousness, that was in the land of Egypt, were ended.

verses.name: Genesis 41:54
verses.text: And the seven years of dearth began to come, according as Joseph had said: and the dearth was in all lands; but in all the land of Egypt there was bread.
